org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl

Class KalmanToGBLDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl.KalmanToGBLDriver

  • public class KalmanToGBLDriver
extends Driver
    A Driver which refits Kalman Tracks using GBL in order to get the alignment derivatives
